bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Preferred Ratings, Related Requirements, and Application Recommendations for Low-Voltage AC (635V and Below) and DC (3200V and Below) Power Circuit Breakers
IEEE Draft Standard for Preferred Ratings, Related Requirements, and Application Recommendations for Low-Voltage AC (635V and Below) and DC (3200V and Below) Power Circuit Breakers
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.16_D16 Dec 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines the preferred ratings for low-voltage ac (635V and below) power circuit breakers, general purpose dc (325V and below) power circuit breakers, heavy duty lowvoltage dc (3200V and below) power circuit breakers, and fused (integrally or non-integrally) lowvoltage ac (600V and below) power circuit breakers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
